service_description: The medical services wing (MSW) of Physio Care comprises of sets of process requirements and outcome measures, which underpin our approach to clinical care.
Therapy services include four different units.In these units patients are given physiotherapy,occupational therapy,pediatricunit, speech and language therapy.
Severely disabled people are rehabilated and are given proper treatment and training.
Latest devices and technologies are used to give the patients proper treatment.
Disabled people are given training on different sectors so that they can earn for themselves and are often offered job in Physio Care.
Physio Care offers education for all. This service can be taken by anyone who is willing to learn.
